title: Light Kinesiology -Kinesiology, ThetaHealing ® Master, Kinesiologist and Meditation Healing
description: Kinesiologist, Meditation and Energy Healing in the Heart ❤️of Ipswich Medical Precinct.
sitename: Kinesiologist, Meditation and Energy Healing in the Heart ❤️of Ipswich Medical Precinct.
text:
Are you feeling blocked stuck or overwhelmed and can not seem to see the light at the end of the tunnel?
With the subtle art or Muscle Monitoring, the kinesiologist can use your own body’s muscle response be the barometer to not only gently getting to the bottom of any issue, but also letting your own subconscious direct how you would release the old patterns and Heal the Cause of your problem that may be causing you pain and suffering.
This sounds too amazing to be true, but it IS truely Amazing.
Before I found Kinesiology myself, I was frustrated that people would expect their method to work on me... But I just did not fit in with other people’s ideas of how I was supposed to be.
Then 15 years ago kinesiology came into my life. The kinesiologist was asking MY body and my MY subconscious was giving answers through how my muscle was reacting to the questions... All this was happening when my conscious mind was lost in the fog and busyness of doing everyday life as a working Mum. It took me by surprise and then like magic my body let go of so much stress that day, I walked out of there like a weight had been lifted.
So after years of study and self development, to be able to give this to others is more than Amazing. It is a joy.
Kinesiology can be used on its own or combined with gentle guided meditation so you can participate in your own healing.
Utilising methodology from Traditional Chinese Medicine, the use of Accupoints and Meridians as well as Energetic Healing with Chakras, Colour Therapy, Sound Healing, Aroma Therapy, Flower Essences and Crystals and Nutrition. Couple this with an understanding of how to work with the muscles and find balance within the system of inter relating parts and aspects of how you work. There is so much to tap into to assist you find the wellness you truely deserve.
You can do it all on your own if you want, but honestly reaching out for a helping hand or two can make it seem so easy.
Light Kinesiology has helped my valued clients with overcoming
Fears Phobias
Anxiety and Stress Management
Pain
Grief and Loss
Overwhelm
Pain
Back Pain
Muscular problems
Chronic Pain
Relationship Stress
Coming to Terms with Change
Memory Loss
Learning Problems
Bullying
Also in helping clients
Finding their Path
Direction and Purpose
Work with their intuition
What makes Light Kinesiology different... I truely care and I take the time you need to look after your needs.
I care about my clients and they are all uniquely individual. No two balances are ever the same. No two clients are ever the same. You get individualised care.
I work best with clients that are open and ready to change, heal and evolve.
If you are intuitive or used to be.
If you are sensitive and empathic you will really enjoy this gentle method of healing with the added bonus of self awareness and enjoying the priceless gift of self discovery
I invite you to try it. Appointments can be booked online at
